pusty.f0i.interpreter

Class Interpreter

  • java.lang.Object
    • pusty.f0i.interpreter.Interpreter

  • public class Interpreter
extends java.lang.Object
    The Interpreter of Pseudo Machine Code parsed by the Parser. The emulation code of a x86 machine runs mainly through this class.
    See Also:
    Inst, MemoryMap, F0iWindowedTick, Bios

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.Integer[] commandsArray
      an array filled with commands (Command Syntax: OPCODE MODE1 INT1 MODE2 INT2 SIZE)
      static MemoryMap memoryMap
      the emulated MemoryMap which contains the used memory and all used registers and flags

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Interpreter()
      The Interpreter currently has no non-static methods or variables and thus isn't used as an object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int exec(MemoryMap map, int cmd, int m1, int i1, int m2, int i2, int size, int line)
      Runs an instruction with the given arguments
      static void init(java.lang.String[] args)
      Initializes the Interpreter and Instruction List.
      static void runAll()
      Runs all instructions until it finished or reaches a halt or jmp $ instruction.
      static void runOne()
      Runs one instruction and increase tempPos.
      static int tick(int line)
      Executes the command in line line

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • memoryMap

        public static MemoryMap memoryMap
        the emulated MemoryMap which contains the used memory and all used registers and flags
        See Also:
        Mem

      • commandsArray

        public static java.lang.Integer[] commandsArray
        an array filled with commands (Command Syntax: OPCODE MODE1 INT1 MODE2 INT2 SIZE)
        See Also:
        OpCodes

    • Constructor Detail

      • Interpreter

        public Interpreter()
        The Interpreter currently has no non-static methods or variables and thus isn't used as an object

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(java.lang.String[] args)
        Initializes the Interpreter and Instruction List. This function splits args into command and memory nodes. It then puts the parsed commands into commandsArray and uses parsed memory to initiate memoryMap. After that, it initializes the Instruction Array with commandsArray
        Parameters:
        args - an array filled with parsed command and memory nodes

      • runAll

        public static void runAll()
        Runs all instructions until it finished or reaches a halt or jmp $ instruction. It prints out the content of AX, BX, CX and DX after that.

      • runOne

        public static void runOne()
        Runs one instruction and increase tempPos. If tempPos is -1 (because of a halt or jmp $ instruction) return without doing anything

      • tick

        public static int tick(int line)
        Executes the command in line line
        Parameters:
        line - the line to execute
        Returns:
        the line to continue from

      • exec

        public static int exec(MemoryMap map,
       int cmd,
       int m1,
       int i1,
       int m2,
       int i2,
       int size,
       int line)
        Runs an instruction with the given arguments
        Parameters:
        map - The emulated MemoryMap
        cmd - command integer
        m1 - mode for i1
        i1 - number parameter 1
        m2 - mode for i2
        i2 - number parameter 2
        size - operation size for this instruction (byte,word,dword)
        line - the current IP
        Returns:
        the new IP
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - something went wrong
        See Also:
        Inst.run(pusty.f0i.interpreter.MemoryMap, int, int, int, int, int, int, int)
